short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Giving Hacker News a little more style.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides a much more pleasant reading experience on Y Combinator's Hacker News website. Includes:

- Much more aesthetically pleasing website
- 100% parity with a Safari extension of the same name (if you work between browsers)
- All original functionality but more readable and better organized
- A Google CSE search overlay
- Absolutely no spam, tracking, or ads injected by me (Google CSE has its own)
